basics.name: Roxane Ruan
basics.label: Shidler Undergraduate Student
basics.summary: I am studying for a B.B.A. in Management Information Systems with a minor in Public Health in the Shidler College of Business at the University of Hawaii at Manoa. I expect to graduate in Spring, 2026.

work.summary: Provide assistance to instructors and students using the labs.
highlights: Under mentorship to learn troubleshooting and diagnosing of data network problems
Install and maintain data network connectivity for Manoa departments
Communicate with network users to resolve problems using various network test equipment
Provide assistance to instructors and students using the labs
Ensure computer equipment and other lab property are appropriately handled
Assist with administrative duties and projects

volunteer.summary: Assisted administration director in contacting local community organizations for event information. Created digital instructions to aid guests in navigating their way through the hospital. Reviewed portal templates and spreadsheets for accurate formatting and calculations.

awards.title: B+ Scholarship
awards.summary: Scholarships awarded to incoming freshmen and continuing students who complete a rigorous high school curriculum with a minimum overall GPA of 3.0 at a Hawai'i public school.
